data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Do you think people learn more from their successes or from their failures? Provide reasons to support your opinion.
data.answer: There are many ways for us to learn. While some people believe that the main source is failures, others insist on the opposite view. I believe that learning from mistakes is a better option. The main reason is that pain allows us to learn very quickly. Looking at the history of successful entrepreneurs, they had multiple failures before they then became successful. Failure also makes us find our inner strength. It gets us through the worst of times. Failure also gives us a reality check, much like storms, earthquakes, and tsunamis, which remind us, we do not have control over everything. In fact, failure, through its life-altering lessons, makes us into better person. (113 字)
